questions.question: This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates arrive on a mysterious island governed by strict time rules and encounter the Foxy Pirates. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates participating in a gladiator-style tournament on an island ruled by a Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This devil fruit allows its user to create tremors capable of causing massive destruction, and was notably used by one of the Yonko. What is...?
This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This character, a member of the Worst Generation, possesses the ability to create a 'Room' and manipulate objects and people within it. Who is...?
This former Shichibukai, known for their sand powers and role as the king of Alabasta, wields the Suna Suna no Mi. Who is...?
This character, a key figure in the Wano Country arc, possesses the mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, Model: Nine-Tailed Fox. Who is...?
